column5: After BMT graduation, spend the day away enjoying nearby attractions such as the Riverwalk, Seaworld, Six Flags, shopping and other great San Antonio attractions!  Guests are sure to enjoy a memorable time in this fully furnished, 3 bedroom/2 bath home. The master bedroom has a queen-sized bed with remaining rooms furnished with a full size bed and bunk beds...comfortably sleeping up to 7 people. The kitchen is equipped with everything you will need and the dining room table easily seats six.
column8: Great home near Lackland Air Force Base
